name: UnmanagedGrant
description: Grant for Eth2. Managed (n) Funding Deadline (n) Contract expiry (n) With Token (n) Percentage based allocation (y) Withdraw (pull payment) (n) This is a simplified grant which behaves as a simple payment splitter. No refunds or managers; payment are immediately pushed. WARNING: vulnerable to sending to Gas Token generating addresses. Trust in grantees not doing so is required.

eventDecorators.name: LogFunding
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: LogFundingComplete
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: LogPayment
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. Triggers on new deposit call.

functionDecorators.name: getContractExpiration
functionDecorators.description: Date after which payouts must be complete or anyone can trigger refunds.

functionDecorators.name: getCumulativeTargetFunding
functionDecorators.description: Overall funding target for all grantees combined.

functionDecorators.name: getCurrency
functionDecorators.description: If null, amount is in wei, otherwise address of ERC20-compliant contract.

functionDecorators.name: getFundingDeadline
functionDecorators.description: Date after which signal OR funds cannot be sent.

functionDecorators.name: getGrantCancelled
functionDecorators.description: Flag to indicate when grant is cancelled.

functionDecorators.name: getGranteePayoutApproved
functionDecorators.description: Get grantee payout approved paid by address.

functionDecorators.name: getGranteeTargetFunding
functionDecorators.description: Get grantee target funding by address.

functionDecorators.name: getGranteeTotalPaid
functionDecorators.description: Get grantee total amount paid by address.

functionDecorators.name: getPercentageBased
functionDecorators.description: Grantee amounts are percentage based (if true) or fixed (if false).

functionDecorators.name: getTargetFunding
functionDecorators.description: Funding threshold required to begin releasing funds.

functionDecorators.name: getUri
functionDecorators.description: URI for additional (off-chain) grant details such as description, milestones, etc.
